name: Sirmaur
description: Sirmaur is known for its rich cultural heritage, ancient temples, and scenic beauty. The district is famous for its fruit orchards, especially apples, and offers numerous trekking trails and adventure activities.
summary: Land of Ancient Temples and Fruit Orchards

locations.name: Nahan
locations.description: Nahan is the district headquarters known for its clean streets, colonial architecture, and peaceful atmosphere. It's a perfect base for exploring the surrounding areas.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: March to June

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for pleasant weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - ATMs available in town
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses from Delhi and Chandigarh
travelTips.accommodation: Wide range of hotels and guesthouses available

locations.name: Renuka Lake
locations.description: Renuka Lake is the largest natural lake in Himachal Pradesh, surrounded by hills and forests. It's known for its scenic beauty and boating activities.

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for pleasant weather
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Nahan
travelTips.accommodation: Limited options available near the lake

locations.name: Churdhar Peak
locations.description: Churdhar Peak is the highest peak in the outer Himalayas, offering panoramic views of the surrounding valleys. It's a popular trekking destination.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: April to June, September to November

travelTips.bestTime: April to June and September to November for trekking
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for local expenses
travelTips.transportation: Trekking required, can hire local guides
travelTips.accommodation: Basic guesthouses available at base camp

locations.name: Haripurdhar
locations.description: Haripurdhar is a scenic town known for its ancient temple and beautiful views of the Himalayas. It's a perfect destination for spiritual seekers and nature lovers.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: March to June

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for pleasant weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for local expenses
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Nahan

locations.name: Paonta Sahib
locations.description: Paonta Sahib is a historic town known for its Sikh gurdwara and scenic location on the banks of the Yamuna River. It's an important religious and cultural center.

travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - ATMs available in town
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Nahan
